rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a North-facing entrance. Features include a reception area and minimalistic design with local stone accents.
An open-plan living area adjoining the kitchen, with natural light from large windows and Vastu-compliant placement for positive energy flow.
Modern, open-design kitchen connected to the living area with ample storage and ergonomic layout in line with Chettinad architectural style.
Integrated dining space within the living area that can be used as a multipurpose room.
Primary master bedroom with spacious balcony overlooking the north facade. Includes ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet.
Secondary bedroom with a private balcony that ensures natural ventilation and Vastu-compliant orientation.
Additional bedroom with a balcony, designed for privacy while ensuring proper sunlight exposure.
Another bedroom offering ample space and individual balcony to maintain consistent design flow and Vastu alignment.
Final bedroom with a well-designed balcony and interior features in sync with Chettinad style aesthetics.
General bathroom facility accessible to the living area and common spaces.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door ensuring positive energy flow as per Vastu principles.
East facing window in the living room for morning light and ventilation.
Door opening to the master bedroom balcony.
